ygData.subject: Re: spells and mana (was I give up)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, that statement was made based on level 29, since I haven t played much at level 30.  I m sure with Heat Blood I can chew through some mana even
ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> As for running out of Mana (My Int is 115 btw), I actually can quite easily
> in a big fight. Cast Darkness and Boil Blood a few times and suddenly your
> OOM.
>

Well, that statement was made based on level 29, since I haven't
played much at level 30. I'm sure with Heat Blood I can chew through
some mana even faster. I have a 113 Int, more if my guild jeweler
gets a little better

Question on Wave of Enfeeblement - how much does it siphon? Is
anyone else using this? I have a Dark Reaver so I switched to it
instead of siphon and rely on the proc to raise my str. Casting
time on Wave is pretty long it seems.

I saved myself with feign for the first time last night, the
casting time seemed reasonable to me (since I lived).


Xilith
